item.description:
Paul, who puts on this dance, has his own meetup group, SuperSingles(TM), where this is also listed.

8:00 pm - 12:00 am ( $12. before 9pm, $15. after 9pm)

Group discount. If I can have 10 of us total from all my meetup group event listings sign up for this ahead of time I can send Paul a list of names to get you a $10 admission. I have been getting way more than 10 RSVPs at these dances.

NOTE THIS NEW POLICY: The group discount only applies if you arrive before 9 PM!! $15 for everyone after 9 PM.

Tell the admissions desk you RSVPd with Neil, for the group discount.

I am listing this with other groups.

Free Dance Lesson @ 7:30pm, Top DJ Dance Music, Complimentary Hor D'ouevres, Raffle, Door Prizes and Cash Bar .

There were good turn-outs for the dances here in previous months.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for My Meetup Sign and ask for Neil.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: SuperSingles Dance
